Bonjour, j'ai découvert que j'étais prob:
Hi, I found out I probably caught {{diseaseName}}. I am writing you because we met during my contagious period that started on {{startDate}}, and that means I may have contaminated you.

I know this is not a pleasant message to receive, but I wanted to notify you because it is important you take all necessary precautions to protect yourself, your friends and your family. Even without symptoms, it's possible you may already be contagious.

To break the chain of transmission, you can list everyone you've met since {{startDate}} and notify them using this site:

{{url}}

P.S.: The website was built by a nonprofit, it is completely free and anonymous.
Bonjour,<br/><br/>Nous vous écrivons de:
Hello,
a person who had {{diseaseName}} said they met you during their contagious period.
Our users' privacy is our priority, that explains why that person is anonymous.

Even if you do not have any symptoms today, it is possible that you are contagious as well.

Don't panick, we're here to hep. In order to protect your close ones, it is critical that you take necessary precautions starting today (be careful + self-isolate).
This website will give you all the steps depending on your degree of exposure:

<21>Break The Chain

{{productName}} is a free website developed by Bayes Impact, a nonprofit engaged in fighting the virus' propagation.

Together, let's break the chain of contagion.

The {{productName}} team,

Le {{diseaseName}} est un virus facileme: The {{diseaseName}} virus is highly infectious. Even if you're only starting to experience symptoms, you might have contaminated others before you knew anything was wrong. Warning them now might help them to be more alert to any symptoms they or their friends and family experience. Warning them could slow the transmission of the virus in the community, and avoid a second wave of infections.
